summary: Adrenaline, also called epinephrine, is a hormone and medicine made by our bodies in the adrenal glands. It helps us in scary situations by increasing heart rate, blood flow to muscles, and blood sugar levels. This gives us energy to fight or run away. Adrenaline is also used as a medicine to treat certain health problems. It can be found in many animals and even some plants.
title: Adrenaline
